settings.heading: Events at Crafts
settings.description: Seeking various avenues for enjoyment, ranging from eatery workshops to Seconds Sale pop-ups. You can locate us at our retail establishments situated in Osaka, Singapore, Rome, and Seoul; or encounter us during our travels to a city in proximity to you.

settings.heading: Origami Magic
settings.description:
Join us at Osaka for a mesmerizing Origami Magic workshop. Learn the intricate art of folding paper to create enchanting designs that amaze and delight.

üóìÔ∏è September 15th, 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM

settings.heading: Traditional Pottery Art
settings.description:
Come and participate in the Pottery Art workshop held in Seoul, where we bring together modern methods and age-old artistry. Craft pottery items that seamlessly combine modern design with timeless beauty.

üóìÔ∏è September 20th, 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM

settings.heading: Batik Painting
settings.text:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Batik Painting at Singapore Art Oasis. Discover the ancient technique of applying wax and dyes to fabric, resulting in stunning and unique creations.


*Tickets for this event are sold out*

settings.heading: Mosaic Masterclass
settings.text:
Unleash your creativity in our Mosaic Masterclass at Rome Creative Hub. Learn how to compose intricate patterns using colorful glass pieces, making your own captivating mosaic artwork.


*Tickets for this event are sold out*

settings.heading: Traditional Hanbok Embroidery
settings.text:
Dive into the world of Korean culture with our Traditional Hanbok Embroidery workshop at Seoul Studio. Explore the delicate art of embroidering intricate patterns onto traditional attire.


*Tickets for this event are sold out*

settings.heading: Pottery Fusion
settings.text:
Join us at Osaka for a Pottery Fusion workshop, where modern techniques meet traditional craftsmanship. Create pottery pieces that blend contemporary design with classic aesthetics.


*Tickets for this event are sold out*
